articles.description: Microsoft’s newest ad takes the “Power Your Dreams” tagline used to promote the Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S to a whole new level. The commercial is directed by director Taika Waititi and features, of all things, Master Chief as a DJ cat.
articles.content:
Filed under:
Id play a game with DJ cat Master Chief
